Impressive from front to back, this executive modern residence has it all. Located in a quiet, friendly suburb just 10 minutes from Geelong, the residence is surrounded by a range of schools, Deakin University, supermarkets, restaurants and retail shopping, and is within walking distance of Waurn Ponds Shopping complex, allowing easy access to everything you need. Public transport couldn't be more accessible, with two train stations only minutes away and a bus stop just meters from the front door. Ticking all the boxes, it includes a list of premium extras that sets the tone for hassle-free living. Spread over a generous 647 sqm block, the immaculately styled home has been designed with both privacy and large scale entertaining in mind.
Showcasing fresh neutral tones and high-end fixtures and fittings, complemented by large windows emphasising space and light throughout. The clever floorplan flows effortlessly together yet with separation in between. The two-way entrance connects directly to the Master suite, which looks out to the sunny backyard. All three bedrooms offer fitted-out built-in-robes, with downlights featuring throughout the house to complete the modern feel. The living room and back two bedrooms have split systems, which provide heating and cooling to all areas of the house. There is plenty of car space, with this property boasting a remote double garage with workbench and built in shelving, a double carport and long driveway.
Immaculately kept, this outstanding residence presents a fantastic opportunity for the astute buyer to take advantage of the affordable market and establish themselves in a well-equipped home. Appealing to 1st home buyers, young families, lifestyle lovers, professionals and savvy investors seeking a rewarding portfolio addition.

Description:
BRIGHT, SUNNY, PROFFESSIONALLY DESIGNED, SPLIT LEVEL HOME
Situated in a sought after location in the Deep Creek Estate Torquay, this nearly 27sq residence sits on a 510²m block. It is within an easy walk to an Early Childhood Centre and two Primary Schools. Completed in 2018, it is a one of a kind, professionally designed, split level home where passive solar principles have been considered.
The 'formal' lounge and Master suite are situated at the front of the home. The ensuite has double basins and twin rainwater showerheads whilst the WIR has shelves and rails along both sides, providing over 6.5mts of storage.
The kitchen, meals and family area, open onto a north facing deck and alfresco. These are surrounded on both sides by a very private, low maintenance back garden. The additional three bedrooms are of a generous size, and all have fully fitted robes. The family bathroom has been designed with a separate powder room and a large walk in shower. These rooms are connected by the rear hall that has a four door storage cupboard.
The large (approx. 7x7m) garage has plenty of space for two cars, additional storage and/or a workbench. It has a remote control panel lift front door and a wide rear roller door to allow drive through access.
Additional features include; timber laminate floors, ducted heating throughout, air-conditioning in the family area, a dishwasher, solar hot water and a rainwater tank.
This home would be ideal for someone who appreciates a light, sun filled home with ample storage, which is close to all of the amenities that the Surfcoast has to offer with the added bonus of children being able to walk to school.

SPECTACULAR, STYLISH, SPACIOUS LIVING WITH OCEAN VIEWS!!
Superbly presented and situated on an elevated position in a quiet court location this spectacular, stylish and spacious residence offering ocean views gives a lucky new owner the opportunity to enjoy this attractive and immensely liveable home built over two levels.
The beautifully architecturally designed home built by Gude Builders with its impressive entry comprises 3 bedrooms with built in robes, sizeable upstairs master inclusive of walk in robe, en-suite and boasts its own private balcony showcasing an ocean view. A fabulous place to entertain, the light filled open plan living with gas log fire and ocean views, dining and kitchen with extensive stone island bench, Smeg appliances and butlers pantry flow seemingly-less to a north facing decked balcony. Those looking for a separate living zone for children and teenagers will love with the downstairs sound-proof rumpus room with split system heating / cooling and study nook area, this zone has direct access to the north facing yard and spa. The family bathroom is situated adjacent to the two downstairs bathrooms. A bungalow houses the 4th bedroom complete with en-suite, Carport and side access the ideal space for the extended family, friends or the perfect B&B.

Set on an easy to maintain 444m2 allotment and surrounded by landscaped gardens in a convenient location of Ocean Views Estate, within minutes of the RACV club house and golf course, main beaches, cafes and restaurants, family living has never looked so good, call us today.

Description:
Character & Charm All Rolled Into One...
Every so often a home comes onto the market with the perfect combination of position and proportion, and this just so happens to be that home. Rich in character with elegant features such as exposed brickwork and pitched ceilings that provide an instant feeling of space and comfort. 
Floating floors upon entry into a large lounge space, huge master bedroom exits to the left with walk in robe and updated ensuite. The second living room is separated by a large double sided chimney equipped with inbuilt gas heaters. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling are also installed throughout for complete year round convenience and comfort. 
Other highlights such as a built in bar and an abundance of built in cabinetry further enhance the livability of this property. A stunning renovated kitchen will impress with solid stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including SMEG freestanding 900mm stove, range hood and dishwasher.
A further two bedrooms are privately positioned with a full bathroom dividing them, both boasting built in robes. A spacious laundry to the rear completes a practical interior. 
Externally, a concrete drive leads to a double lock up garage providing ample off street parking and secure storage. The property has multiple outdoor entertaining areas, both undercover and exposed to enjoy plenty of natural sunlight with both artificial and genuine turf creating great play spaces for children and pets on a plentiful 675m2 (approx).
Fantastically positioned to take advantage of the many local schools both primary and secondary, public transport including the Marshall & Waurn Ponds train stations, multiple major Shopping Plaza's, Deakin University & Epworth Hospital while also only being a short few minutes drive into the Geelong CBD and Waterfront.
